          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Christ in the limbo</string>
            <string language="de-DE">Christus in der Vorhölle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ dans le limbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ no limbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ nel limbo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός στο κενό</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo en el limbo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">Medieval and early modern visual culture: a digitized piece of art.<br>Artist: Master of the Ochtin  Presbytery<br>Date: Second half of the 14th century<br>Where to find: Ochtina - Slovakia</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Culture visuelle moderne médiévale et tôt : 
un morceau numérisé d'art.&lt;br&gt;Artist : Maître du 
Presbytère d'Ochtin : Deuxième moitié du 14ème 
century&lt;br&gt;Where à trouver : Ochtina - La Slovaquie</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cultura visual moderna medieval e adiantada: 
uma parte digitada de art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: Mestre do Ochtin 
Presbytery&lt;br&gt;Date: Segunda metade do 1ô century&lt;br&gt;Where a 
encontrar: Ochtina - Slovakia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coltura visiva moderna medioevale ed in anticipo: 
una parte data valori numerici a di art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: 
Supervisore del Ochtin Presbytery&lt;br&gt;Date: Seconda metà 
del quattordicesimo century&lt;br&gt;Where da trovare: Ochtina - La 
Slovacchia</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεσαιωνικός και πρόωρος σύγχρονος οπτικός πολιτισμός:
ένα μεταλλαγμένο κομμάτι art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: Κύριος του
Ochtin Presbytery&lt;br&gt;Date: Δεύτερο μισό του 14$ου 
century&lt;br&gt;Where για να βρεί: Ochtina - Σλοβακία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cultura visual moderna medieval y temprana: 
un pedazo digitalizado de art.&lt;br&gt;Artist: Amo del Ochtin 
Presbytery&lt;br&gt;Date: Segunda mitad del 14to century&lt;br&gt;Where a 
encontrar: Ochtina - Eslovaquia</string>
          </description>
        </general>
